issue.title: [C++] Re-enable runtime/references cpplint check
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4798](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4798). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will help keep the codebase clean.

We might consider defining some custom filters for cpplint warnings we want to suppress, like it doesn't like `benchmark::State&` because of the non-const reference

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4798?focusedCommentId=17116104) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
The benchmark thing is enough of a nuisance that I won't bother with this. We've been pretty effective about catching mutable references in code reviews
